ygData.subject: RE: Mipmapping question
ygData.msgSnippet: Me too.  I am actually taking a break from a security audit. yuck. Certainly teh data from server regarding the zone (players etc) should impact
ygData.messageBody:
Me too. <both hands up>
I am actually taking a break from a security audit. yuck.
Certainly teh data from server regarding the zone (players etc) should
impact zone time, but still If i zone with my group they are all out on the
other side waiting for me and make fun of me! In PvP this is a SERIOUS
issue.

True that verant offers us ...doo-doo on the subject, but then again who
daid they are required to do so.

From: James Archer [mailto:james@...]

Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Mipmapping question
